Texts.Chs: 一个有一面厚重镜子的梳妆台。
Texts.Eng: A dresser with a heavy lookin' mirror.

Texts.Chs: 一本正经的虚荣心。尽可能保持整洁，这肯定会让你一整天都看起来很体面。
Texts.Eng: A prim and proper vanity. Staying as neat and tidy as it will surely keep you looking presentable throughout your day.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人用他们的小眼睛偷窥...叶族人！
Texts.Eng: Floran ssspies with their little eye... Floran!

Texts.Chs: 我一整天都穿着这件衣服到处走吗？！
Texts.Eng: Have I been walking around with that on my outfit all day?!

Texts.Chs: 我可以看到自己花了很多时间在镜子前准备。
Texts.Eng: I could see myself spending a good deal of time getting ready in front of this mirror.

Texts.Chs: 我很惊讶这种虚荣心能支撑这么重的镜子。
Texts.Eng: I'm surprised this vanity can support a mirror that heavy.

Texts.Chs: 这看起来像是玩具屋的虚荣。
Texts.Eng: This looks like the vanity for a dollhouse.

Texts.Chs: 这面梳妆台的镜子看起来太重了...
Texts.Eng: This vanity's mirror looks awfully heavy...
